title: CarShop
summary: Full-stack e-commerce platform for vehicle parts featuring AI recommendations and real-time customer chat.
details: Engineered a RESTful API with Node.js and Express for product, user, and order management.
Implemented a real-time customer support chat using WebSockets.
Developed an AI-powered recommendation engine based on user browsing history.

title: Apartment Complex Management System
summary: Normalized relational database with optimized stored procedures and reporting tools for property and resident management.
details: Designed a 3NF relational database schema to eliminate data redundancy.
Wrote complex PL/SQL stored procedures and triggers to automate rent collection and maintenance requests.
Built custom reporting tools to track occupancy rates and financial performance.

title: Student Globe
summary: Native Android social platform with real-time chat rooms and N-Tier architecture for maintainability.
details: Developed a native Android application using Kotlin and modern Android jetpack components.
Used Firebase Authentication for secure user sign-up and login.
Implemented real-time chat rooms using Firebase Realtime Database.
